title: Change DLL override to Native
body:
Hi Folks,

do i have to perform a DLL override for:

- d3d8
- d3d9
- d3d10core
- d3d11
- dxgi

As far as i remember i had to to this some years ago. I wonder why this is not mentioned in the Readme.md?

Greetings,
J.
author: jotkah

comments.body: Yes, it is necessary. I don't know why this was removed from the README, probably an oversight but we definitely used to mention it at *some* point.
